title: Jet Squelcher
paragraphs: The Jet Squelcher is a main weapon in the Splatoon series, created by Custom.
It has a slow fire rate and low damage compared to other shooters, but has more range than any other shooter.

The Jet Squelcher has two main parts, both blue. The handhold housing the trigger is in between them. The top part is home to multiple warning labels and a black knob. Sticking out of the top part is a long black barrel with a dull white nozzle at the end. A black tube connects the two parts.
The Jet Squelcher comes with the sub Splash Wall and the special Inkstrike.
- An Inkling girl holding a Jet Squelcher.
- Official art of an Inkling holding the Jet Squelcher.
The Jet Squelcher returns in Splatoon 2 looking identical to how it did in the first game. It comes with Toxic Mist and Tenta Missiles.
It appears in ten Octo Expansion stations:
The Jet Squelcher returns in Splatoon 3, looking identical to the past game. It has Angle Shooters and the Ink Vac as its kit.
It appears in three missions in Return of the Mammalians:
- The middle left Inkling is wielding the Jet Squelcher.
- The Tableturf Battle card icon of the Jet Squelcher.
For competitive tips about the Jet Squelcher
- The design of the Jet Squelcher appears to be based on a Pressure Washer.
Jet Squelcher is derived from "Jet Washer", a name pressure washers are commonly marketed under with Squelcher meaning "to squelch", being an onomatopoeia of splashing liquid.
